verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If My people
which are called by My name
Shall humble themselves
shall humble themselves and pray

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If My people
which are called by My name
Shall seek My face
and turn from their wicked ways

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Then will I hear from heaven
Then will I hear from heaven
Then will I hear
and will forgive
forgive their sin

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I will forgive their sin
I will forgive their sin
I will forgive their sin
And heal their land
